Welcome to the Treasure Burial mode, it's great to have you onboard! 

This is the mode where you get to go out and bury a treasure for some other buccaneer to find. 

By playing this mode you are actively contributing to the game's community and you are awarded points for every treasure you hide. 

All you need to do is go out, find some interesting location you want to share with the world, and bury your virtual treasure there. Then construct a virtual path of waypoints (clues) leading to that location, and that's all there is to it!
What is the name of this waypoint?
Enter some information about this location
What is the hunter\'s task at this location?
What is the expected solution for this task?
Give your Treasure Hunt a name
Enter a description for your Treasure Hunt

All the waypoints and the final treasure location have now been recorded. 

Now enter some final details about the Treasure Hunt you just created. 

Make sure that you describe what is interesting about it and what you are trying to teach the hunters through this excursion. 

After publishing the Treasure Hunt, you will be awarded 10 Pirate Points for helping the community grow.
You have found the treasure and completed this game!

Your Treasure Hunt is now published! 
Hunters will soon start looking for your treasure! 

Thank you for contributing to the game's community. 
You have been awarded 20 Pirate Points
Do you really wish to exit?
Select a game mode to get started
Do you really wish to sign out?

It seems like you do not have enough points to attend this Treasure Hunt! \nTry attending an easier game that requires a lower score, or go hide your own treasures in Treasure Burial mode to get lots of Pirate Points!
You have already found this treasure

Welcome to Treasure Hunt! A game about solving tasks at interesting locations in the physical world to getting points and achievements in the digital world! 

 After logging in your are taken to your Dashboard. 
 From the Dashboard you can view information about your own account such as your Pirate Score, access the drawer menu and select one of the two game modes to play. 

 TREASURE HUNT MODE 
 
In this mode you act as a Hunter, and are looking for Treasures in your location, placed by fellow players. 
Treasure Hunts are routes made up of Waypoints - Real world locations that form a path leading to a final location. 
Once at a waypoint, you will have to solve a specific task or puzzle, set up by the author (pirate) of the Treasure Hunt and enter your solution in the game to proceed. 
If you successfully solve the task at the final location then the Treasure Hunt is considered solved and the Treasure found. 
Each Treasure Hunt you attend costs you a different amount of Pirate Points (depending on its difficulty). 
If you successfully complete the Treasure Hunt, you are awarded Pirate Points that you can use to access other Treasure Hunts and unlock achievements. 
 
If you ever find yourself in a situation where you do not have enough points to attend a certain Treasure Hunt, you might want to have a look at the other game mode to boost your score


 TREASURE BURIAL MODE 
 
In this mode you will be acting as a Pirate, and will be creating your own Treasure Hunts in areas of your liking and interest that other players can search for in Treasure Hunt mode. 
Try to be creative! Think of unique, interesting locations near your area or far away. Try to make each of your games exciting, educational and fun. 
Whenever you finish a Treasure Burial session and successfully publish your Treasure, you will be awarded 20 Pirate Points as a reward for helping the game community grow.

This app was build by the foreseen developer as the final undergraduate project during his studies at Swansea University 2020-2021 

The project was developed under the CSP354/CSP344 - Project Specification and Development module and was supervised by Dr. Jennifer Pearson 

The development took place entirely in Android Studio using the Kotlin language using standard Android libraries, Google Material Libraries and the Google Maps API 

The login/signup service relies on Firebase Authentication and all user and game data is stored online at Firebase Firestore servers in western Europe.

This app makes use of the Android Material Icons Library licensed under the Apache Licence 2.0, in addition to other icons as follows: 

The App Icon and all other graphics of this app have been sourced from flaticon - https://www.flaticon.com under their Flaticon License, which allows for free use for personal and commercial purposes with appropriate attribution. 

Flaticon creators of graphics used in this app: 
Freepik, Smashicons, Nhor Phai, Becris, Nikita Golubev,
